TopicTitle: Get KSP For 25% off during the Steam Holiday Sale!

Articles.Content:
<p><a href="http://t.co/f8EPb69OhC"><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/4a9f62a8c7386e1dabdf0acabe1339e0/tumblr_inline_ngsitwxWl11rr2wit.png"/></a></p>

<p>You heard it, everyone! KSP’s on sale for <strong>25% off</strong> the regular price during Steam’s <a href="http://t.co/f8EPb69OhC"><strong>HOLIDAY SALE</strong></a>! Whether you have yet to experience KSP or you want to share it with others, now’s a great time to show exactly why we’re “Beta Than Ever.”</p>
This should help those that want to try the new update
Ohh, I might be able to persuade my friend to buy it now, thanks Squad!

Man what a perfect timing! Just last night I was selling a ton of Steam inventory items, to be able to afford the $30 price.

I only managed to scrounge up $23.44, however the sale has brought it down to just $22.49!

Thanks!

Edited August 30, 2018 by bmullins0118
Is it off in the store also? because i can't have steam...
